Package.name: Mission

Key.English: Server is running the following mods, but you are not:
Server is running Task Force Radio Arrowhead mod, but you are not!
Key.Russian: На сервере установлен мод Task Force Radio Arrowhead, но у вас его не обнаружено

Key.English: Install Play withSIX (play.withsix.com) to install, update and run required mods.
Key.Russian: Установите Play withSIX (play.withsix.com), обновите и запустите нужные моды.

Key.English: Dynamic Take And Secure by Gal Zohar, Modified for FNF
Key.Russian: Динамический захват и зачистка от Галь Зохара - Рандомальная атака и защита основанная на раундах миссия ПВП без респаунов.

Key.English: Gal Zohar, Fritz, FNF Technical Team
Mission by Gal Zohar. Modernized and improved by the Friday Night Fight Technical Team.
Inspired by DTAS (Dynamic Take And Secure) for Infiltration, which is a realistic total conversion mod for the original Unreal Tournament (1999).
Key.Russian: Под вдохновением миссии DTAS (Dynamic Take And Secure) для инфилитрации, которая является конверией мода для оригинального Unreal Tournament (1999).

Key.English: Logo and Russian localization by Excess3.
Spectating is possible for all dead players and players who join while a round is in progress.
Switch between player cameras using the forward and backward keys (Default 'w' and 's').
You can press the lean keys (default 'q' or 'e') to exit the spectator script and change your weapon loadout.
Use the action menu on the yellow cinderblocks in order to resume spectating.
Select your equipment using the action menu on an ammo crate. Weapons and ammunition will be given once round starts.
Key.Russian: Выбирите ваше снаряжение используя action menu на ящике боеприпасов. Оружие и боеприпасы будут выданны с началом раунда.

Key.English: Attackers and defenders have different loadout options. When you play as attack (or defense), your default loadout will be the last loadout you selected when you last played on attack (or defense).

When only 1/10 or less of the attacking force are left alive, or when only 1 attacker is left alive, time limit will be cut down to %1 seconds. Attackers will be notified, but defenders will only find out once the time runs out and their mission is successful.
Key.Russian: Когда только 1/10 или меньше от атакующей команды в живых, или только один атакующий жив, ограничение времени будет уменьшенно до %1 секунд. Атакующие будут оповещены, но защитники изнают только тогда когда время истекет или миссия завершенна.

Key.English: Each round is limited %1 minutes (possibly cut short by last players countdown). Dead players will be sent to a remote location until next round starts. Attack and defense teams will switch roles after the first round and then every 2 rounds. The objective position will be changed every 2 rounds, so you always attack and defend each zone once.
Key.Russian: Каждый раунд ограничен на %1 минут (может будет изменен взвязи с последними оставшимися). Мертвые играки будут отправлены на удаленные места до оканчания раунда. Команды атаки и защиты поменяются ролями(сторонами) после первого раунда и каждые два раунда. Место задания будет измененно каждые два раунда, так что вы атакуете и защищяете каждую зону по разу.

Key.English: Capture speed is slowest when attackers only have 1 man inside the zone, and lasts 60 seconds. Capture speed is increased significantly increased as more attackers enter the zone, but is never faster than 20 seconds capture time. Defenders have no notification of capture progress, so defenders must verify that the zone is clear of enemies if they wish to ensure their victory. You must be outside of vehicles and above sea level to capture the zone.

Using the action menu of the yellow cinderblocks, an attacker squad leader will choose their insertion method and location, at least %1 meters away from the objective, and can then click ready. Round will starts once all squads with enough squad members are ready.
Number of players required dependson the numebr of players on the server. If you do not have enough squad memebers, your squad leader will not have an option to choose insertion method and position.
A default jeep insertion location will be selected automatically and used if none were chosen after %2 seconds as well as for squads who did not have enough squad members.
Drivers will be assigned to vehicles based on each player's preference, which can be set by using the action menu on the yellow cinderblocks.

from the defenders before time runs out (%1 minutes), while defenders need to prevent them from completing their mission. Win at least %2 out of %3 times and at least 2 rounds more than the enemy team to win the entire game!
Key.Russian: у защищающих до того как время (%1 минут) истекет ,в то время как защищающие должны предотвратить захват. Выиграть %2 из of %3 раз хотябы на 2 раунда больше чем враг чтобы выиграть в игре!

Key.English: Press your "Team Switch" key (default 'u') and then use your mousewheel to manage squads.

You can join a squad, as well as lock and unlock your squad (prevent or allow joining of new squad members), kick squad members and promote a new squad leader. You can also leave your squad in order to create a new one.
Player markers have different colors depending on their squad. Your squad leader is orange. You are red (or orange if you are the squad leader). Your squad members are green. Everyone else are blue.

First faction available on server.

Never

Key.English: Weapons will be given once round starts.
Key.Russian: Оружие будут выданны с бачалом раунда.

Key.English: Click on map to select a position for %1 insertion.
Key.Russian: Нажмите на карту чтобы выбрать позицию для %1 вторжения.

Key.English: Click on map to select a good objective position.
Key.Russian: Нажмите на карту чтобы выбрать хорошую позицию для задания.

Key.English: Select insertion method and position using the yellow cinderblocks.
Key.Russian: Выбирите способ вторжения и позицию s pomoщью желтого блока.

Key.English: Invalid position! Pick an insertion position outside the red circle.
Key.Russian: Непрабильная позивия ! выбирите позицию для вторжения вне красного круга.

Key.English: Invalid position! Jeeps must start on land.
Invalid position! Boats and submarines must start on water.
Invalid position! Helicopters cannot start flying (feedback.arma3.com bug #0021806).
Click on the map to select the objective location.
You are no longer attempting to capture the zone.
Key.Russian: Вы больше не притендуете захватить зону.

Key.English: You are now attempting to hold. Make sure there isn't an overwhelming number of enemies inside the zone.
Key.Russian: Вы притендуете удерживать. Убидитесь что у врага нет большего количества играков в зоне.

Key.English: "You are no longer attempting to hold the zone.
Key.Russian: Вы более не притендуете на захват зоны.

Key.English: Try again! Next round will start shortly.
Do better next time! Next round will start shortly.
Your team ran out of time.
Enemy team ran out of time.
Your team has captured the zone.
Enemy team has captured the zone.
Enter the zone and capture it before running out of time.
Do not let attackers get inside the zone.
You are AFK and will be killed in %1 seconds if you do not move.
You were killed for being AFK.
Server difficulty settings are unsuitable for PvP. Request the server administrator to disable the following options:
Server difficulty settings are unsuitable for hardcore realism. Request the server administrator to disable the following options:
Warning! Poor server performance! Average server FPS: %1
Cannot carry a backpack and a launcher at the same time.
Cannot attach sights to Zafir, MX SW, RPK or PKP.
Only medics can carry more than one first aid kit.
Only medics can carry first aid kits.
Group is no longer available for joining.
